channel.title: SwiftSwitch - Very good RS Client v2.31. :)
channel.description:
Home Site: http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/ Download Site: http://www.runescapecommunity.com/index.php?showforum=277
Anybody use SwiftSwitch to play on RuneScape? It's perfectly legit and works great.
Here are some screenies if you wanna see. http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/screenshots/1.png http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/screenshots/2.png http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/screenshots/3.png http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/screenshots/4.png http://www.swiftswitch.net/old/screenshots/5.png
The crash bug is now fixed. No credit given to me... Grr lol. Oh well. Now the only problem is that you can see your chat password in a specific registry entry. I'm too lazy to find it now, but I think it's.. HKCU\Software\VB*\SwiftSwitch\Settings click on Chat or Pass or something. And your chat password should be there unencrypted. Will be fixed in version 2.32.
Enjoy! :D
~Ron [br][size=1]Posted at: July 21, 2006, 12:36:15 PM[/size][hr]Oh and if you download, install it, and you get an error message right when it says "Checking for Updates" that means that your firewall is blocking it. So instead of posting on the forums about that problem, it can be solved right here. :)
That must be the most common problem people have. Second common problem is that your java isn't updated. The latest version is something like... 1.5 Update #7 at www.java.com. So if you want a better RuneScape or just want to play RuneScape, update your java. :)
~Ron

They fixed the bug, where you can crash it. Didn’t give me any credit for finding it though. :mad: lol ahh well. So much for being a beta tester for it.

item.source: SwiftSwitch - Very good RS Client v2.31. :)

item.title: SwiftSwitch - Very good RS Client v2.31. :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Freddy1990:

Actually i hate it cuz it’s crap, prolly more than half of the code is leeched and it can easilly be made

Well it’s not leeched but I have spoken to the creators. There is like 10 of them that helped build it in vb. Personally I think VB is complete crap compared to writing something in C++. If someone could make a better client, that wouldn’t get you banned, and was undetected, had auto logins and blah blah, was made in C or C++, had the same or more features, got rid of the 30 second wait before entering a world, and had built in autotyper with colors and effects. THEN I woul definitely switch.

Freddy, you should make a client like what I have described. I know you have your own, but I don’t think it has everything I just described.

Read full topic

item.title: SwiftSwitch - Very good RS Client v2.31. :)
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

A lot of people do, but the majority of RuneScape doesn’t. I’ve talked to many people who did not know about SwiftSwitch. I got a lot of my friends into it, but a lot of them think it goes against the rules. Which it doesn’t. You’re allowed to use it and it does not give you an unfair advantage. It’s a very fair advantage.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

oh you can move the applet up or down lol.

Look on the top and click on Server > Move Applet Up

You won’t see the ads and RuneScape will be in the right spot.

~Ron
